Package SciTK

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayUtil
    Implement various functionality for working with arrays and Lists
    DialogAbout
    Implement a dialog box for displaying info about the program
    DialogError
    Implement a GUI error dialog box
    DialogMultiPrompt
    Implement a GUI dialog box which prompts the user for an arbirary number of parameters, with somewhat different layout than the Dialog_Prompt class for better UI.
    DialogPrompt
    Implement a GUI dialog box to get a value from the user.
    ExtensionFileFilter
    Implement a class for file loading Selection is based on file extensions
    Plot
    A class which uses Java swing to make a generic window for JFreeChart plots.
    PlotXY
    Implement a class which uses JFreeChart to make a generic XY scatter plot.
    PlotXYError
    Implement a class which uses JFreeChart to make a generic XY scatter plot with error bars.
    PlotXYLine
    Implement a class which uses JFreeChart to make a generic XY line plot.
    PlotXYStep
    Implement a class which uses JFreeChart to make a generic XY step plot.
    PlotXYZBlock
    Implement a class which uses JFreeChart to make a generic XYZ plot using "blocks".
    PromptValue
    Implement an abstract class for functionality which allows for automatic type and value validation for user input via SciTK dialogs.
    PromptValueNumeric
    Implement a class which wraps some functionality for getting a numeric value from a user via prompt with type and value checking implemented here.
    PromptValueString
    Implement a class which wraps some functionality for getting a String from a user via prompt
    SciTK_App
    Implement the framework for an application using SciTK.
    SciTK_Dialog
    Add some functionality to JDialog, to be extended by other dialogs within this toolkit
    SciTK_Frame
    Add some functionality to JFrame, to be extended by other dialogs
    SciTK_Image
    Implement a class which takes raw 3-d data on a rectangular grid.
    SciTK_Text
    Some very simple functionality for reading/writing text files
    WindowManager
    Implement a window manager for the analysis GUI.
